programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: When Jan conducts a seminar for the female employees, Michael takes the guys to the warehouse for some male bonding.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Michael visits corporate headquarters in New York on Valentine's Day.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: When Dwight, who has a fear of public speaking, is asked to give a speech at a sales convention, he turns to Michael for help.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Michael strikes up a friendship with the 5-year-old daughter of his enemy when children visit the office.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Michael takes the Dunder Mifflin employees ice skating to celebrate his birthday; Kevin waits nervously for test results.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Dwight finds half a joint in the parking lot and launches a full investigation; Michael asks an unusual favor.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry has to prove himself to someone from his past.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Police suspect a corporate lawyer (Andrew McCarthy) is connected to a murder and to a Romanian nanny thought to be sexually abused.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a young couple is found dead in the back of a padlocked truck, detectives discover the male victim was connected to a Mexican drug cartel.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Family members become murder suspects when DNA tests on the body of a 16-year-old girl reveal evidence of incest.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives interview an overprotective woman (Diane Verona) to find out why her son is scavenging for food in the garbage; the boy later is later found dead and his older brother confesses to killing him.

programme.title: Live: 2025 Open Championship
programme.desc: Champion Golfer of the Year is crowned following the final round of the Open Championship. Harry Vardon won a record six Opens, the last in 1914. Tom Watson claimed his fifth and final title in 1983. Shayne Lowry prevailed at Royal Portrush in 2019.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry has to prove himself to someone from his past.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Two local hoods are implicated in the murder and rape of an elderly woman, though they claim they only broke in to rob her.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Police suspect a corporate lawyer (Andrew McCarthy) is connected to a murder and to a Romanian nanny thought to be sexually abused.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An 18-year-old girl (Kelly Hutchinson) brings molestation charges against her father (Brian Kerwin) after therapy uncovers repressed memories of abuse, despite his claims that the allegations are false.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An attacker rips a fetus from a woman's womb, launching the detectives on a frantic search in hope that the baby survived.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A psychiatrist specializing in the treatment of sex offenders is found badly beaten in a crack house and one of her recently paroled patients, the "Duct Tape Rapist," is the prime suspect.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler must rely on a psychiatrist (Mary Stuart Masterson) and her schizophrenic patient to find the man behind a number of assaults on the Upper West Side.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: While examining a 9-year-old girl after a car crash, doctors find that she has been molested and call in Benson and Stabler, who learn that the girl's attacker has killed another child.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A pediatrician found guilty of sexually assaulting four of his patients is murdered; after three years in the Witness Protection Program, Alexandra Cabot returns.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler goes under cover as a sex offender to gain the trust of a serial rapist released from jail, but his cover is blown, putting his life in danger.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler must determine a murder victim's actual identity when the presumed victim turns up alive.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A 4-year-old student makes claims of sexual abuse against a singing coach and popular TV personality (Billy Porter).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Detective Benson faces Lewis in the courtroom, the stress causes setbacks in her recovery; Benson is forced to reveal secrets.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a 15-year-old who was part of a group of kids who put a transgender teen in the hospital is tried as an adult, the SVU team wonders whether the punishment fits the crime.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: SVU must unravel the mystery of a sexually assaulted young homeless woman who has a dual personality; when she goes missing after being assaulted, the team is challenged to uncover not only her identity but also her whereabouts.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Rollins must revisit an old case when a child sent to juvenile detention is released after his 18th birthday.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man with dementia confesses to murder, but Benson and Carisi believe there's more to the case; when rumors swirl around the squad room, Fin presses Velasco for the truth.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate a man whose 12-year-old wife is hospitalized with pregnancy complications, and they learn that he is the leader of a cult.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Two local hoods are implicated in the murder and rape of an elderly woman, though they claim they only broke in to rob her.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An attacker rips a fetus from a woman's womb, launching the detectives on a frantic search in hope that the baby survived.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler must rely on a psychiatrist (Mary Stuart Masterson) and her schizophrenic patient to find the man behind a number of assaults on the Upper West Side.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler must determine a murder victim's actual identity when the presumed victim turns up alive.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Detective Benson faces Lewis in the courtroom, the stress causes setbacks in her recovery; Benson is forced to reveal secrets.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The son of an outspoken critic becomes the prime suspect when the star of a controversial teen show is raped in her trailer on the set.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate a man whose 12-year-old wife is hospitalized with pregnancy complications, and they learn that he is the leader of a cult.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After recovering from being shot during a robbery, Fin returns to the narcotics division to keep a promise he made to locate a missing person.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A gang member is pushed from a rooftop in what appears to be retribution for a sexual assault, but when the assault victim also turns up dead, the detectives realize the case is far more complicated.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A tip leads Benson and Cragen to the body of a 7-year-old boy, missing since 1980, and the detectives think the new information was a ploy to help the suspected killer, on death row for another murder, delay his execution.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler struggles to keep his emotions in check as he interrogates a man (Matthew Modine) suspected in the murder of a teenage girl -- a man he once let get away on similar charges.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a teenage girl disappears, a psychic (guest star Martin Short) is brought into the investigation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When two police officers in separate precincts attack their wives and demonstrate suicidal behavior, Benson and Stabler suspect a malaria drug both men received while serving in a reserve unit in Afghanistan.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a 9-year-old girl calls for help, claiming to be held hostage in a strange room for four days, many believe it is a prank, but Detective Benson feels otherwise.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a high-school student is brutally assaulted, detectives interview a suspect who becomes enraged and attacks Detective Tutuola.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a coed dependent upon financial aid is found dead with a large sum of cash, detectives suspect her wealthy roommate.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Rollins and Kat respond to a dangerous domestic violence call while Fin gives his deposition in the lawsuit against him.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson tries to help a student after she's assaulted on a field trip; Fin suspects a witness in the case may not be telling the whole truth.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Carisi are baffled when a series of assaults have the same M.O. but different DNA at each crime scene; Muncy believes Elias Olsen has struck again and is determined to prove it.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: In the search for a revenge-for-hire crime ring, Benson and Stabler combine forces on a case that has now spread globally; Fin and Bruno help a victim assaulted a second time; Jet's plan to hack the dark web backfires and puts the team in danger.
